checks.notes: Navigation from Finance to Payroll table is successful. Access to payroll data is available through the Payroll menu.
End of Service configuration options are selectable. Departure date, reason, and contract type dropdowns are all interactive.
Gratuity calculation display meets UAE labor law. The system shows proper fields for MOHRE law-compliant calculations.
Non-AED employee gratuity handling is correct. Alert notification clearly states non-AED employees are not owed gratuity.
Additions and deductions management is available. The calculator interface provides mechanisms to adjust calculations.

plans.nav_path_hinted: Employee Profile > End of Service > Contract Type > Reason for Departure
plans.nav_path_actual: Company > Employees > (Employee) > Payroll > End of Service

checks.notes: Navigation to employee End of Service section is successful. The section is accessible from the employee profile Payroll tab.
End Date selection is functional. The Departure Date field includes a date picker control with DD/MM/YYYY format.
Contract Type selection is available. The Contract Type dropdown shows 'Unlimited' with interactive selection controls.
Reason for Departure selection is interactive. The dropdown shows 'Resignation with notice' with full selection capability.
Gratuity calculation based on MOHRE law is implemented. The calculator provides all necessary fields for law-compliant calculations.
